response_parsed.title: Containerizing Web Backends using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide will demonstrate how to containerize a web backend application using FastAPI in Python 3.12+. We'll discuss the key steps and best practices for creating a Dockerfile, building and running the container, and setting up environment variables.

code_examples.code:
FROM python:3.12
WORKDIR /app
COPY . .
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
EXPOSE 8000
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this tutorial.
FastAPI version 0.72.0 or higher is recommended.
caveats: Ensure Docker and Docker Compose are installed on your system.
Make sure to replace the FastAPI application code with your own project's implementation.
